results.name: The Power Is No End Chapter 3

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit, Windows 8.1 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad CPU Q6600 @ 2.40GHz (4 CPUs) / AMD Phenom 9850 Quad-Core Processor (4 CPUs) @ 2.5GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 9800 GT 1GB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 850 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 10 Compatible
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit, Windows 8.1 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3470 @ 3.2GHz (4 CPUs) / AMD X8 FX-8350 @ 4GHz (8 CPUs)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 850 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 10 Compatible
